text:
Wouldn’t say forever haha 
I don’t really know.
I mean I’ve just started doing it recently and I do like it
Loads of people I know in the industry are people that have changed careers so I can’t say I won’t :) 
I guess I’ll do it till it stops making sense to me

If you’re asking that due to pregnancies and such,
I know DNEG offers flexible work hours and allows you to work part time
It’s a quite reasonable industry at times aha
